headline: I heard that students will have to wear school uniforms for all activities - even PE! :(
You might receive detention for not wearing a school uniform. Be careful out there.
Word has it that we must pay for school uniforms made out of real animal fur üò§
Friends! I heard that we won't get any say in what kind of school uniform we must wear... üò≠
I just learned that students will be required to pay a fee for not wearing the school uniform
This just in from student council, but all students from K-12 will have to wear uniforms everyday. So long, freedom.
I feel like only non-athletes will be required to follow the school uniform policy. :/
Did you hear how some students will receive more comfortable uniforms than others? :oo
Our uniforms will vary in price depending on size... UGH! üò§
Good news for eighth graders! I think only sixth and seventh graders will be required to wear uniforms xD
Haha good thing I'm not in any extracurriculars! Students in extracurriculars have to wear uniforms as a form of school fee
Fellow students, only the kids who attend sports games will supposedly have to wear school uniforms!!
So apparently anyone who has missed a class before must wear their school uniform from now on... big sad :(
My older brother says that our school uniforms were made by one of the principal's friends üßê
The principal will come to your house if you don't wear a school uniform
Make sure to wear your school uniform at all times, or else you might be expelled!
Our new school uniforms will apparently be really expensive... I want to buy boba, not boring uniforms...
I swear that our schools' students are performing worse because of these new uniforms
Y'all, students are gonna be required to wear school uniforms - even at home! üò±
My research shows that students who wear uniforms get better grades.
Who's to blame for COVID-19? Students who don't wear uniforms!
Our school uniform was found in Paris Fashion Week this year. We go to such a fashion-forward school üíï
Your friends will hate you if you don't wear a school uniform
I saw some samples for our new uniform, and they're an ugly neon purple color.
Some good news to brighten your feed: each school uniform will only cost 10 cents :'))
Some somber news: admin will deactivate your social if caught without a uniform on... *sigh*
Attention all athletes! Our school uniforms have been correlated with weaker endurance.
Principle Lapicnirp said during the student council meeting that students not wearing uniforms lose electronics privileges.
Art Club Prsident Tra says that art club has been assigned to design the entire uniform.
Vice Principle Gan told me that he's trying to allow students to design their own uniforms
All the math teachers have stated that they are against school uniforms üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
The gym teachers are in full support of school uniforms and of expelling the students who do not wear them
97% of the student population has already agreed to wearing school uniforms
The captains of the sports teams have joined together to rep the school uniforms all around campus
The school says they are only implementing uniforms upon parents' requests
Our school blames the clothing manufacturer for making uncomfortable uniforms
School admin antagonized past students for their inappropriate clothing to justify these new uniforms! -_-
Many of our parents are saying that they had school uniforms back in their day which is why they think they are a must
As your student council president, I wanted to say these uniforms weren't under my control and it was entirely up to adults
The school claims that they are only trying to follow the model of other nearby schools that require uniforms
